attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the trial verdict in the Rhys Jones trial and the death of baby P isn't it time we brought back a punishment to fit the crime. When somebody is found guilty of killing another or involved in the killing of another and there is no doubt at all that they are guilty then the correct punishment must be death. Putting these people in prison is just a drain on the nations resources especially in these times of the credit crunch. Not only will this save the nation money it will also cut prison over crowding and send out a message to criminals and gangs that people will no longer tolerate any more of this behaviour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
